reviewText: I don't know if it's necessary to watching in color. It comes in black and white too. I prefer the original color, black and white.
As a tour director I play this on the bus when I am going to Saratoga NY.
a rip-off....stick with the pbs documentay
Seabiscuit is one of my favorite movies.  I have watched it several times and still not tired of it.  Acting is outstanding on everyones part.  I highly recommend this movie, it is great.
So happy to have this movie. It arrived quickly and as described.

I purchased this film having seen the motion picture that came out some time ago, and was not sure what to expect. This is a very well made documentary that shows everything about Seabiscuit, from his birth and all through to his great races. Even if you never saw the major motion picture about the story of Seabiscuit  you will be entertained by yet another great release from Legend Films. A good one for the kids too, but maybe not the toddlers!! I gave this one a well earned 5 star rating.
